main event: A witness observed a round, greenish white object descending and hovering briefly over Green Bay, Wisconsin on 8 November 1956.
interesting points: The object was half the size of the full moon and slightly fuzzy around the edges,The sighting lasted for about five seconds,The object descended straight down before hovering momentarily,The observation was made at a distance of 0.5 miles and at an angle of 25-30 degrees,The report speculated that the sighting was likely caused by a meteor.
witness description: civilian, home director in Green Bay
